page.title: 08GARDENS
page.content: Nearly everybody in our area has a garden near or round their house. Some people have pieces of land away from their house called allotments. Trees and bushes you can find on the side of the road and some people have them in their gardens. Flowers are special in lots of ways. They give honey. They have a nice smell, look nice and make people happy. The best thing about them is that you can get different types and all shapes and sizes. Vegetables are one of the many things that we grow in the garden. We grow vegetables to eat. They are also good for you. Some trees give nuts, some give fruit, and some give much enjoyment to children for climbing and and to climb and for people to sit under out of the sun. Written by Louise Rowell
